Lunarpines head moves left dodgeing the optic blasts. He throws a backslash
with his right arm deflecting the sword in the same direction. His left arm
comes across in a hook motion shoving his blades at Grizzltrons armpit.

"This bot's insane and has to be stopped before he hurts someone." he thinks
knowing that it's weaponsfire could easily bring down the cave.

----- Original Message -----
From: Beast Wars AKA Proto <beastwars@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 23, 2001 5:18 PM
Subject: Re: what ever happened to Grizzletron?


�Grizzltron�


   Grizzltron jumps backwards.  He optics light up as he fires an optic
blast at Lunarpine's face.  He jumps forward and slashes with his sword at
his enemy's chest.
